lines.text: Morning Julia!  Market's a bit choppy today, but overall, I'm seeing some interesting movements. Tech is a bit sluggish, but consumer discretionary seems to be holding up relatively well.  Tesla's been bouncing around a bit, and I'm keeping a close eye on its earnings call next week.  What's on your radar this morning?

Hey Frank!  Thanks for the overview.  I'm particularly interested in Tesla right now, given the recent price fluctuations.  Also, I've been looking at Amer Sports; their recent product launches seem promising, but I'm struggling to find a clear picture of their overall financial health and future projections.  Any insights you have on either would be great.

TSLA's earnings will be key.  Their recent production numbers were solid, but the overall market sentiment is impacting their share price.  Amer Sports is a bit trickier; I haven't dug into their financials deeply recently.

Thanks, Frank.  So, it sounds like Tesla is a bit of a gamble depending on the earnings call, and Amer Sports needs more research.  I appreciate the quick overview.  I'll do some more digging on Amer Sports myself.
